data.caption: Clarification sought from Choice International Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought Clarification from Choice International Ltd with reference to the media report titled "Choice International Gets SEBIs Approval to Set Up MF Business" appearing on https:// in.investing.com dated December 29 2025 (Link : https://in.investing.com/news/stock-market-news/choice-international-gets-sebis-approval-to-set-up-mf-business-4591996.

The Company is requested to submit its clarification to the Exchange in terms of the provisions of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter & Half Year Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body: Un -Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter & Half Year Ended September 30, 2021 along with Limited review Report of Auditor''s thereon

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Outcome of Board Meeting of the Company held on November 12, 2021 inter alia has considered and transacted the following business:

1. On the Recommendation of the Audit Committee, the Board has considered and approved the Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021 and has noted the limited Review Report of Auditor thereon.

2. Constitution of the Rights Issue committee for the proposed Rights Issue of the Company.
